DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine the analgesic effect of perioperative nefopam on acute pain in patient undergoing orthognathic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Nefopam on Acute Postoperative Pain in Patients Undergoing Orthognathic Surgery
DOC.criteria: aged 2060 years undergoing elective orthognathic surgery pregnancy psychiatric disease hepatobiliary or renal disease monoamine oxidase inhibitortaking patients
